result.arabic_text: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرۡهُ نُنَكِّسۡهُ فِي ٱلۡخَلۡقِۚ أَفَلَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
result.translation: 68.Idoolitti iyyam fan qumri как neyxeere num ginó kaak korisnaah, yooboke saakih innah kaa gacisna hebeebih (sabarah), amah abe Rabbi qhiyaamah ayró ken ugusu waamih dudda leemil ma kas- kassoowaanaa?
